about_the_game:
The King's Tournament is a party game playable with up to 4 players in Online and Local Multiplayer. TKT is a fun party game, with a replacement of the board game phase by transforming it into an intense combat phase where they fight for the throne !!

COMBAT MODE

A dynamic gameplay that replaces the usual board game phase where you will face off against your friends with an arsenal of various bullets. Inflict as much damage as possible to win. Destroy your friends with well-placed cannon balls, create alliances to prevent the first to win by joining forces against him.

MINI-GAMES

Challenge yourself to multiple mini-games in order to win various bonuses from the octopus merchant, and grant yourself powers that can give you victory.

CUSTOMIZATION

Change your appearance with a variety of wacky options and dress up your character as you see fit.



for any request, use our pro mail : Surltekostudio@gmail.com

name: The King's Tournament

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The King's Tournament is a party game playable with up to 4 players in Online and Local Multiplayer. TKT is a fun party game, with a replacement of the board game phase by transforming it into an intense combat phase with various items and endless customization.
